title: How does Chloe Ferry become a millionaire? - Quora

response.answer_text: At the age of 24, Chloe Ferry is officially a millionaire.  It can be recalled that the Geordie Shore star became famous when she made her first appearance on the hit MTV show back in February 2015. Chloe became a millionaire from her TV work, modelling, Instagram earnings, beauty products and personal appearances. According to reports from The Sun, the reality TV runs two firms to handle her cash for her which boast more than £250,000 in cash. Moreover, in 2018, the blonde beauty is said to have paid £61,000 in Corporation Tax.  Based on reports, for one single post, Chloe can be paid up to £3,000 just by sharing a picture of herself posing with the product or wearing the fashion garment. The news of the reality star's million-pound earnings comes after she raised eyebrows with a rather cheeky picture of herself cooking up a storm in the kitchen.
